text: Tim McKeon is an American writer, director and producer. He is the co-creator and head writer for the PBS Kids series Odd Squad.http://tvo.org/article/about/-tvokids-odd-squad-honoured-with-five- daytime-emmys--0 He also worked as a writer on Adventure Time, Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends, Gravity Falls, Fish Hooks, Wander Over Yonder, among others. He is currently the showrunner of the upcoming series adaptation of Unlimited Squirrels.https://deadline.com/2020/10/hbo-max-cartoon-network- greenlight-three-projects-mo- willems-1234604555/https://www.animationmagazine.net/2022/01/mo-mo-willems- content-coming-to-hbo-max-cartoon-network/ ==References==
title: Tim Mckeon
